pageContext.claim: “They've [China] been very helpful. Let's put it this way, they've done more for me than they ever have for any American president. China has done far more for us than they ever have for any American president.”
pageContext.analysis: The Chinese put on a show for Trump, knowing he likes them, but this is a fairly ridiculous comment to make, especially given the limited interactions between the leaders so far. Trump previously had said he had been treated better than anyone in China's history, so this is to some extent a pullback, in that he is limiting this comment now just to U.S. presidents.
